channel.title: Suggestions
channel.description: Just curious, what are you rsps players into these days? I see a large variety of rsps and I only see few that actually succeed. So tell me, what do you guys suggest? A modern day rsps with unique features or oldschool? or perhaps something different, your suggestions would be appreciated.

item.title: Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

uhm, In my past 2 months of hosting my server people asked me to keep updating like runescape did, One person even asked me to create citadels, My answer ofcourse was “Nou” but from what i see people like to be as close to runescape as possible without actually being runescape… The main reason people hate runescape is because it takes stupidly long to achieve a 99, But with the correct xp rate, say 7-10 hours for a 99 combat skill would be a great server which people would enjoy.

All skills working is also a very important thing, people love competitiveness and challenging to be the best, PvM drops is important too, its a known fact that spawn servers don’t last long as they get boring due to bad economy. I hope i’ve helped.

Read full topic
